resources.string:
"Android developer specialist with more than 5 years of engineering experience broad range of industries, including POS solutions. Solid understanding of mobile and software development life cycles.
" + "Dedicated to continuously developing, implementing, and adopting new technologies to maximize development efficiency and produce innovative applications.
" + "
" + "• Created high-quality Android Apps and server-side integrations.
" + "• Ensure applications are properly integrated with Android API’s.
" + "• Ensured content met or exceeded business and client requirements.
" + "• Wrote clean, clear, efficient, and maintainable code.
" + "• Proficient in design, data structures, problem-solving, and debugging.
" + "• The interaction between various devices and versions of Android.
" + "
" + "I enjoy the challenge of creating new software and get know every new technology. "
